message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly benefit your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and features, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at $2000000. This price reflects the high value we place on this item and the opportunity it presents for you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.

Thank you for offering your premium product. While I appreciate the value you attribute to it, my budget allows for a lower price. I am willing to pay $1500000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
